mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(B.STANDARD_ID)) FROM PD_GNQ_STD B LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD A ON A.STANDARD_ID = B.STANDARD_ID

SELECT A.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID ,B.GNQ_STD_ITEM_NAME ,A.GNQ_OK_VAL ,A.GNQ_NG_VAL ,B.PARENT_ID ,B.PARENT_NAME FROM PD_GNQ_STD AS A LEFT JOIN PD_GNQ_STD_ITEM B ON A.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID = B.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID WHERE A.STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId} ORDER BY A.STANDARD_ID,A.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(B.STANDARD_ID)) FROM PD_GNQ_STD B LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD A ON A.STANDARD_ID = B.STANDARD_ID

SELECT DISTINCT(B.STANDARD_ID) AS standardId ,A.CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode ,A.BREED_CODE AS breedCode ,A.MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode ,A.FEATURE_CODE AS featureCode FROM PD_GNQ_STD B LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD A ON A.STANDARD_ID = B.STANDARD_ID ORDER BY B.STANDARD_ID
LIMIT #{startPos}, #{pageCount}
